com.model.layout

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.model.layout.Room

  • public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    A representation of a room in the game. This can contain various objects, enemies, and room specific effects.
    Author:
    Christopher

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Room()
      Constructs a new empty room with no special effects.
      Room(GUI view)
      Creates a new room that will be notified by the given GUI.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addEnemies(java.util.Collection<Enemy> enemies)
      Adds a list of enemies to the room.
      void addEnemy(Enemy enemy)
      Adds an enemy to the room.
      void discover()
      Set the 'discovered' flag to true, marking this room as having been seen by the player.
      void enter()
      Set the 'entered' flag as true, marking this room as having been entered at least once by the player.
      java.util.List<Enemy> getEnemies() 
      boolean hasBeenDiscovered() 
      boolean hasBeenEntered() 
      boolean hasBeenSearched() 
      void hideEntities(java.util.Collection<Entity> entities)
      Adds multiple entities that will be found when the room is searched.
      void hideEntity(Entity entity)
      Adds an entity that will be found when the room is searched.
      java.util.List<Entity> search()
      Attempts to search the room, returning a set of all objects found.
      void setView(GUI view)
      Sets the view notified by events caused by this rooms and members.

    • Method Detail

      • addEnemy

        public void addEnemy(Enemy enemy)
        Adds an enemy to the room. This will be ignored if the enemy is already in the room.
        Parameters:
        enemy - enemy to be added.

      • addEnemies

        public void addEnemies(java.util.Collection<Enemy> enemies)
        Adds a list of enemies to the room.
        Parameters:
        enemies - enemies to be added.

      • hideEntity

        public void hideEntity(Entity entity)
        Adds an entity that will be found when the room is searched.
        Parameters:
        entity - entity to be hidden.

      • hideEntities

        public void hideEntities(java.util.Collection<Entity> entities)
        Adds multiple entities that will be found when the room is searched.
        Parameters:
        entities - entities to be added.

      • getEnemies

        public java.util.List<Enemy> getEnemies()
        Returns:
        a list of enemies in the room.

      • enter

        public void enter()
        Set the 'entered' flag as true, marking this room as having been entered at least once by the player.

      • hasBeenEntered

        public boolean hasBeenEntered()
        Returns:
        true if the player has entered this room at least once.

      • discover

        public void discover()
        Set the 'discovered' flag to true, marking this room as having been seen by the player.

      • hasBeenDiscovered

        public boolean hasBeenDiscovered()
        Returns:
        true if the room has been discovered.

      • search

        public java.util.List<Entity> search()
        Attempts to search the room, returning a set of all objects found.
        Returns:
        entities found by the search.

      • hasBeenSearched

        public boolean hasBeenSearched()
        Returns:
        true if the room has been searched, otherwise false.

        Sets the view notified by events caused by this rooms and members.
